name: NTR Dream
description:
NTR Dream features a steamy story about an affair going too far. With animated sex scenes and voice covers for them, this short visual novel will grant you the best experience! Want to make it more special? You can name all characters in the game and watch as the play unfolds with your personal touch!

Key Features

  • Animated and fully uncensored scenes featuring great art and filled with steamy sex and spicy details.
  • Great sounds, from the hot moaning to the environmental ambiance.
  • Name all characters to make this story your personal play!
  • An in-game gallery that allows both replaying unlocked scenes and just watching CGs from them.
  • Quality of life features like hiding all interface elements with a simple button click.
